abstract.p: A Mughal officer orders the local officials of Dhar to entrust several revenue-free (inʿami) villages to Purshottam Das because he has appointed the landlord (chaudhri) of the district (pargana).

div.p:
مقرر شد که متسدیان مهمات و متکفلان معاملات حال و استقبال
پرگنه دهار متعلقه سرکار مندو من مضافات صوبه مالوه بدانند که
چون بموجب نشان عالی شان سعادت عُنوان از قرار بتاریخ چهارم شهر رجب المرجب
سنه سی جلوس میمنت مانوس موافق سنه یکهزار و شصت و شش هجری النبویه
خدمت چودهرای پرگنه مذکور حسب الالتماس سیادت پناه وزارت دستگاه
میر ابراهیم
و عزت ایات کفایت شعار ملا عبدالسلام به پرشوتم ولد موهنداس مقرر و مفوض گشته
و موضع آهو وغیره بموجب تفصیل مرقومه فی الظر بشرط دولتخواهی و ابادان کاری
که لازمه اینخدمت است در وجه انعام
ان مرحمت شده باید که
خدمت مرجوعه را با مواضع انعامی وغیره باو مقرر دانسته وا گذارند که
حاصلات انرا فصل بفصل و سال بسال متصرف شده لوازم حدمتگاری و مراسم دولتخواهی
انچنان تقدیم رساند که آبادی و معموری پرگنه روز افزون گردد درین باب
تاکید لازم دانسته تخلف نورزند تحریراً التاریخ

It was fixed that the mutasaddis of important endeavours and guarantors of the present and future affairs
of pargana Dhar , dependency of sarkar Mandu annexed to suba Malwa should know that
since according to the glorious imperial nishanPossibly issued by the prince Murad Bakhsh . Both Abdussalam and Mir Ibrahim had seals that associated them with this prince. See Order of Abdussalam to Purshottam Das and Paras Ram about a dispute with other officials lf_pDas_1655_brd_ac, and Order of an employee of Murad Bakhsh to the officials and residents of Dhar about rights to water, lf_pDas_1655_dai_lns235ms_j. written on the date of the fourth of the month of the revered Rajab
year thirty of the auspicious reign, equivalent to the year one thousand sixty and 6 [1066] of the flight of the Prophet,
the service of chaudhrai of the aforesaid pargana according to the petition of the Refuge of Sovereignty, Power of the Ministry
Mir Ibrahim
and Sign of Honour, Distinguished by Ability Mulla Abdussalam was fixed and entrusted to Purshottam [Das] son of Mohan Das.
And per the details written on the zimn [and] on condition of loyalty and making [the villages] prosperous, village Ahu , etc.,
that are the perquisites of this service, are granted as inʿam . The document was laminated with onion-skin paper and some words are illegible due to damage to the laminating layer. It is necessary that they [the officials being addressed] hand over the previously mentioned service along with the inʿami villages, etc., knowing these to be granted to him [Purshottam Das] so that
enjoying the revenue of that [i.e., the villages] season by season and year by year, he shall present [i.e. perform] the necessities of service and the obligations of loyalty
to such an extent that the habitation and cultivation of the pargana shall increase daily. In this matter
knowing urgency [to be] necessary, do not delay. Written on the date 19 month Rajab the revered, year 30 of the
glorious exalted reign, equivalent to year 1066 Hijri. Nothing further.
समक्ष पाहिली सदरहूची नोंद रजिस्टर बुकातिल आजक्रम नंबर १३० यातकेली आहे तारीख ७ माहे आक्टोबर सन इसवी १९०२
Witnessed that the aforementioned document has been noted in the daily register book number 130. Date 7 October 1902 CE.
